name: Original Six Speed Hockey
description:
Original Six Speed Hockey is a two-player sports game in which the two players face eachother in a fast retro-style fast hockey game!

Like regular hockey, there are unlimited overtime periods that go on until one player scores!

Unlike regular hockey, the periods are one minute long, and there is only one regular period, after that, overtime!

Controls (Player 1):

Arrow Keys - Move

Right Shift - Shoot

Controls (Player 2):

WASD - Move

E - Shoot
